input: Subject: A traditional Japanese garden; Characteristics: meticulously arranged bonsai trees and koi pond; Timing and lighting: spring with blooming flowers; Background: stone pathways and lanterns; Feeling: harmonious and peaceful.
coverage: A traditional Japanese garden featuring meticulously arranged bonsai trees and a tranquil koi pond in spring, adorned with vibrant blooming flowers. Bathed in soft natural sunlight, the scene highlights stone pathways and elegant lanterns in the background. Set against a backdrop of lush greenery, the garden exudes a harmonious and peaceful atmosphere, evoking a sense of serene beauty and balanced tranquility.
validityText:
The input is structured as a list with labeled sections (e.g., "Subject:", "Characteristics:") rather than as a natural language paragraph. This violates the specification that requires the input to be a single paragraph written in natural language.
